advisory: If rice crop is in PI stage go for 2nd top dressing of fertilizer with 17.5 kg urea & 12 kg MOP /acre recommended & maintain 2-3 cm of standing water in field.
Prevailing warm and humid weather may increase the incidence of Sheath blight and Blast disease in rice so apply (Tebuconazole 50%+ Trifloxystrobin 25% WG) @400g/litre of water.
If BLB Incidence increases, spray Copper Oxychloride @ 500gm along with Plantomycin @ 200gm/acre or Soil application of additional dose of MOP 12 Kg/acre recommended.

Monitor the population of BPH & WBPH by regular field visit if the pest population buildup at initial stage alternating drying & wetting of field & foliar application of neem based formulation 1500ppm (600ml/acre) recommended.
Monitor the population level of WBPH & BPH by regular field visit.

Prevailing weather condition may increase the infestation of mealy bug & scale insects in sugarcane. To control these pest spraying of Thiamethoxam@80g/acre & Lambda cyahalothrin @4.9CS@250ml/acre recommended.

Brinjal - To control Fruit and shoot borer in Brinjal Spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages. If the pests continue ETL, go for alternate spray of Spineturam@11.7%SC @200 ml/acre and Emamectin benzoate @ 80 g/acre at 15 days interval.
Okra - To control cercospora leaf spot in okra spraying of (Metalaxyl + Mancozeb) @400g/acre recommended.
To control downy mildew in bittergourd & pumpkin spraying of Azoxystrobin @100ml/acre recommended.

Coconut - Monitor the activity of the Red palm weevil and Rhinocerous beetle by placing pheromone trap. Spray Lambda cyhalothrin @1.2ml/lit of water to the nearby manure pits for killing the developing stages of Rhinocerous beetle.

Papaya - Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector (Whitefly) of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus. Alternate spraying of Neem oil formulation 1500ppm @3ml/lit of water and spray flonicamid 50WG @0.3g/lit to control whitefly.
